title: Band, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace (reticella style)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Central band of reticella in floral and geometric motifs. Edged on top and bottom with narrow bands of reticella.
